message_list.content: Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. How can I help you today?
Hi, I need help changing my booking for my trip in November.
Great, I can help with that. Could you share your reservation (PNR) and your last name so I can pull up the booking?
Sure, my reservation code is KQNUAJ, and my last name is Wilson.
Thanks, I’ve located your booking for Wilson. Would you like me to proceed to look for alternative flights in November—any preferred dates or times?
Yes, I’d like to move my return flight to November 19th instead of the 18th, preferably in the evening again.

Got it—searching evening return options on November 19. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I found several choices. Here are the top three:

1) Flight CA472, departs 6:10 PM, arrives 9:05 PM. Estimated fare difference: $0.
2) Flight CA480, departs 7:45 PM, arrives 10:40 PM. Estimated fare difference: $28.
3) Flight CA488, departs 9:20 PM, arrives 12:10 AM (+1). Estimated fare difference: $15.

Which one would you like to switch to?
I’ll go with the first option, Flight CA472 at 6:10 PM.
Perfect—switching you to Flight CA472 on November 19, departing 6:10 PM and arriving 9:05 PM. Before I finalize, could you confirm the passenger name and your contact email and phone number on file?
Sure, the name is Riley Wilson, email is riley.wilson@inbox.dev, and phone number is +1 6080323050.
Thanks, Riley. I’ve updated your contact details. I’m now confirming the exchange to Flight CA472 on Nov 19, 6:10 PM–9:05 PM. There’s no fare difference due. Shall I go ahead and complete the change?
Yes, please go ahead and complete the change.
All set—your return is now changed to Flight CA472 on November 19, departing 6:10 PM and arriving 9:05 PM. You’ll receive a confirmation shortly. Anything else I can help you with today?
No, that’s all for now. Thank you for your help!
You’re very welcome. Have a great trip in November!
